subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Jarome Iginla and James Neal each scored twice, and the Penguins routed the Senators, 7-3, on Wednesday to take a 3-1 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Jarome Iginla and James Neal each scored twice, and the Penguins routed the Senators, 7-3, on Wednesday to take a 3-1 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinal series.
